title: Bishop critcises Malaysian education minister over "divisive and incendiary remarks" (The Anglican Communion)
text: ( Source : The Anglican Communion ) [ACNS] The Archbishop of South East Asia , the Most Revd Bolly Lapok, has called on Malaysia 's new education minister to apologise for 'divisive and incendiary remarks' he made recently about Christians and
